DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Minigame card, gain a random effect from this list: NL - Gain #b3 block. NL - Gain #b3 Gold. NL - Deal #b5 damage to a random enemy. NL - Draw #b1 card. NL - Apply #b1 weak to ALL enemies. NL - Apply #b1 vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL - Gain #b1 Temporary Strength. NL - Gain #b1 Temporary Dexterity. NL - Reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by #b1 for this turn.
After each triggered action (skill or attack) items lose #b1 durability. NL When durability reaches #b0, items break.

Grab the described item. NL Items empower attacks and skills, and can be thrown. NL If an item is already grabbed, throw it and grab the new one. NL Triggering effects decrease durability by #b1. NL When durability reaches #b0, items break.
Each heat level adds #b2 attack damage and #b2 block gain. NL Heat Level caps at #b3 stacks. NL Lose #b1 Heat Level whenever you take damage.
#yAttack: Deal #b1 more damage. NL #ySkill: Gain #b2 block. NL #yThrown: Deal #b6 damage damage to a random enemy.

Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
